body_html:
Instead of assigning to grad which was used for Mul, if you assign a new variable (auto new_var = Add(...)) things should work. (but pick a better name than new_var :) )

Edit: Removed incorrect statement to be less confusing :)
body_text:
Instead of assigning to grad which was used for Mul, if you assign a new variable (auto new_var = Add(...)) things should work. (but pick a better name than new_var :) )
Edit: Removed incorrect statement to be less confusing :)
body:
Instead of assigning to `grad` which was used for `Mul`, if you assign a new variable (`auto new_var = Add(...)`) things should work. (but pick a better name than `new_var` :) )

Edit: Removed incorrect statement to be less confusing :)
